# SuiteGenie

> AI-powered social media automation platform for agencies and creators. Manage publishing workflows, credits, team access, integrations, and support resources in one place.

SuiteGenie helps teams streamline social media operations with guided setup, automation tools, and account-level controls across connected products.

## Product Overview

- [Homepage](https://suitegenie.in/): Main overview of SuiteGenie and core value proposition.
- [Features](https://suitegenie.in/features): Feature breakdown across automation, collaboration, and workflows.
- [Pricing](https://suitegenie.in/pricing): Current pricing options and plan details.
- [Plans](https://suitegenie.in/plans): Plan-focused experience and account upgrade paths.

## Getting Started

- [Docs](https://suitegenie.in/docs): Product documentation and onboarding guidance.
- [Help](https://suitegenie.in/help): Help center and practical support resources.
- [Integrations](https://suitegenie.in/integrations): Available product and platform integrations.

## Company

- [About](https://suitegenie.in/about): Company background and product mission.
- [Contact](https://suitegenie.in/contact): Contact options for sales and support.

## Policies

- [Terms](https://suitegenie.in/terms): Terms of service.
- [Privacy](https://suitegenie.in/privacy): Privacy policy and data handling details.
